name: startup
description: [Link to class notes](notes.md) # Elementary ## Specification Deliverable ### Elevator Pitch Elementary is an extremely simple strategy game of obtaining and fusing elements. You can fill out the periodic table and discover heavier and heavier elements. This website has a practical and educational use as well, containing a guidebook with information on each element in the periodic table. There is a leaderboard showing which user has discovered the heaviest element and how much of it.
